title: Sans-Serif Western looking typeface?
content:
I was trying to figure out what the "Alex" and "Celebrate" font is as well as the "SANDERS" and "University of South Florida". Also looks like the "6:00 PM" is also different. Thanks to all those that help me with this!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818095022im_/http:/typophile.com/files/invitation_4921.jpg)
author: Smeesters

comments.content:
"Alex/Celebrate" is **[ANGEL TEARS](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818095022/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=ANGEL%20TEARS%20-%20trial&fid=22a0ea04b8e51b48d3a3b868b4b651f0&fsize=60&text=Alex%20Class%20Of%20%20Celebrate&fit=1)** by Billy Argel (Free for Personal Use)  
"SANDERS 2012..." is **Captain Howdy** by Harold Lohner (1999)  
"6:00 PM" looks like a modified **Oklahoma** by Harold Lohner (2006)

-----------------------------------------------  
I found them using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818095022/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
